name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OneMob - More Engagement with Free Microsites

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get More Attention, Engagement and Responses with Video Email and Trackable Microsites. All for Free and No Code Required.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OneMob Chrome extension is a tool for creating and sharing microsite links from Gmail and LinkedIn. It allows you to create engaging microsites with personalized messages, branding, and multimedia elements. OneMob is packed with features such as mobile, web and screen recorder, script teleprompter, video editing tools, video approvals and engagement tracking. Itâ€™s a must-have for sales reps and marketers. You can get started with OneMob for free by visiting onemob.com.
